HomePage.howToPlayDescription: Pingo is a bingo game where AI judges based on photos. Take photos, upload them, and let AI identify the subjects to progress through your bingo board.

loginSection.title: 1. Login (Registration)
loginSection.description: Let's create an account and log in!

step1.title: Register an Account
step1.description: Let's start by creating a user account. Enter your username, email address, and password, then click the "Register" button.

step2.title: Top Page After Login
step2.description: After logging in, you'll see two buttons: "Create Game" and "Join Game". Choose one to get started!

createGameSection.title: 2. Create a Game
createGameSection.description: Become the host, create a game, and invite your friends!

step1.title: Create a Game
step1.description: Click the "Create Game" button and enter a game title and theme.

step2.title: Generate Subject Candidates
step2.description: Click the "Generate subjects with AI" button, and AI will automatically generate subject candidates based on your theme. You can freely edit the suggestions!

step3.title: Share the Game
step3.description: Once you've created the game, you can invite friends using the game ID or QR code on the share page. Turn on "Public Settings" to display a QR code.

playGameSection.title: 3. Play the Game
playGameSection.description: Both created and joined games are played the same way!

step1.title: Play on the Bingo Board
step1.description: The game page displays a 5×5 bingo board. The center cell is "FREE" and already open. Photograph each cell's subject and aim for bingo!

step2.title: Upload an Image
step2.description: Click the "Upload Image" button and select a photo of the subject. The image will be previewed with file information!

step3.title: AI Judges the Photo
step3.description: AI will analyze your uploaded image. If the subject matches, it'll be "Accepted" with a confidence score and detailed evaluation comments!

step4.title: Achieve Bingo
step4.description: Complete a vertical, horizontal, or diagonal line to achieve bingo! You'll be celebrated with a confetti animation. Try to complete multiple lines!

HomePage.saveChanges: Save and see your changes instantly.
HomePage.title: Pingo

dropZone.description: Supports JPEG, PNG, HEIC, and WebP files up to 20MB
dropZone.title: Drop an image here or click to select

errors.fileTooLarge: File size too large. Please select an image smaller than 20MB.
errors.unsupportedFileType: Unsupported file type. Please select a JPEG, PNG, HEIC, or WebP image.
